data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AtG5QdXvSXsQ7kNvgGibCiw&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCqZa72l05FcbKHWc1Ei0pl51Wle-vCvx7g1ZqDd99_DA&oe=670A5BB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ph8IoYModYIQ7kNvgH6_Kqx&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBluPgpQp5eWqBbTSFGSlK6WhHYoge2WyxR3fz-Zd89NQ&oe=670A6952)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ybj7e80J8gAQ7kNvgGY71DG&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAFOim6c7ixQHRexKhJMGl3MIYiR1mMm_VXrDH0MbGvtQ&oe=670A5489)
